metadata.title: CVE-2017-15914 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.description:
Incorrect implementation of access controls allows remote users to overriderepository restrictions in Borg servers 1.1.x before 1.1.3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15914` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

borgbackup - 1.1.4-2build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: borgbackup package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.4-2build1').
